Title: Blackbird XNA Toolset
Description: The Blackbird XNA Toolset is a suite of libraries and WPF applications that are designed to make development of 2D games for the XNA platform faster. It's currently being developed in c# 4.0 and it targets the XNA framework v4.0.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The Blackbird XNA Toolset is a suite of libraries and WPF applications that are designed to make development of 2D games for the XNA platform faster. It's currently being developed in c# 4.0 and it targets the XNA framework v4.0.
